alert.note: Alert for Centre; Huntingdon; Mifflin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 5:13PM EDT until June 22 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania... Northern Mifflin County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 513 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bald Eagle State Park to Boalsburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... State College, Lewistown, Bellefonte, Boalsburg, Pleasant Gap, Lemont, Burnham, Zion, Belleville, Houserville, Pine Grove Mills and Milroy. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Snow Shoe and Lamar exits, specifically from mile markers 155 to 166. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 74 to 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
